TextView.android:text: My project - GameGroup is a social network type app about finding people for basketball games. I'm basketball player and I really like to play basketball on the courts, but one of the problems is finding players for 2 v 2, 3 v 3 games and so on. So I actually combined my love for the basketball and sports industry along with the background I acquired in my app development studies. The name Game Group , which is a catchy name and contains the name game , and the name Group whose two names relate to the subject of my work. The target audience of the app is for all ages from 12-99 who want to go and play basketball as a team.
